title: IDEA: ModJill
content:
Hi, I was just wondering if anyone has or is making a graphical editor for Jill of the Jungle if anyone does email me the full, or if your working on one email me he beta, either way you can email me the full or a beta at [url=mailto:HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com] HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com[/url], if it exists.-------------------

title: Re: IDEA: ModJill
content:
You don't need to post these ideas everywhere. Everyone's getting aggravated already.

Probably Wombat game tools will feature exporting and importing Jill graphics. If I remember correct it can view them currently.

Search the web and please ask in other places, this isn't the Center of DOS gaming and knowledge.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: IDEA: ModJill
content:

title: Re: IDEA: ModJill
content:
If you are more than 5 years old, and you are, you should have enough self-control to prevent you posting stuff the same way you post in the other forums.

"Maybe I shouldn't post topics. Maybe I can reply to topics but I can't start one. MAYBE THIS IS THE WAY RULES OF FORUMS SHOULD BE!!!!"
Might be better in your case.

You can post topics, but as I already told you, people are getting annoyed of your constant "IDEA: x" topics. Not to mention most of your replies are conversational and not related to the subject.
As well, it's about more than posting stuff "as fast as you wish", it's about their content as well. We don't want to see thousand of this kind of topics in few days.

I now say what I've thought for a while; you are either a troll or Shocks again.. (Or well, it's kinda same thing.)

If you can't control yourself here it might be best that you go and stay in your other forums.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: hehe
content: Best I can tell, he's just extremely enthusiastic, and unfamiliar with the definition of Message Board versus Instant Messaging or Chat.  I'd say a post limiter wouldn't hurt, the way eK stamped down Unfleexable so long ago...

title: Re: hehe
content:
I agree with a post limit, similar to what Unfleexable had. A view limit would be rather cruel, though - didn't eK impose that solely because he wanted to be cruel to Unfleex without any good reason?
